replies.body: Hey guys, I'm seeing a few reports on this so I'm trying to figure out if there's something going on too.  Can you relog and let me know if that resolve the issue?  Personally looking at some of the reporting accounts, everything seems okay on our end, so this could just be a visual issue.
I had it happen and relogging did nothing for me. The missions are still gone. I made a thread a few days ago.
Same for me , i also have the pass for worlds :S

> [{quoted}](name=Duba is Life,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=lfHyKTh2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-26T18:18:19.399+0000)

> Same for me , i also have the pass for worlds :S

Same here!
Yes, i just got a notification "added to mission" yet when i click my missions tab nothing is on the list. Doing a full client repair. Using a Mac by the way( I know it sucks)
